description: Department of Internal Medicine focuses on the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of non-surgical conditions in adults.

description: Our Dental Consultants attend patient’s routine dental checkup and recommend appropriate specialized dental care where required.

name: Medical Surgery
description: Surgery is a medical specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person to treat a pathological condition
